natural_language_query: Which customers have purchased blue products?

sql_queries: SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_id, c.name FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN sale_items si ON s.sale_id = si.sale_id JOIN products p ON si.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.color = 'Blue' ORDER BY c.name;
results.title: Customers who purchased blue products
